posts.postText:
Could I have my blue name color removed? I miss being in a server without Mods or Admins.
Not because I dislike being in a clean server, it's because I like a messy one 
without all the goody-two-shoes regulars.. 

Or as an undercover Mod deal like Farrow
either way, could my blue name be removed?

I'll assume you need to make a group, and if so
could it also have the command teleport? People
keep getting stuck in areas or inside each other
due to teleporters like in dm_peaches_castle
or dm_supermarioworld

Gash said it was no longer possible to do this. However, I'm not sure how Pharaoh has one. If it is possible again to change the colors of names then I demand that I get a colored name back from the contest I won.

Honestly I NEVER see you use commands anyways, there is no point for you to be undercover.

That's because you're never on when I DO use them. If there aren't rule breakers on, why even bother using them?

Back on-topic: I forgot he said that ;~; but Joster also got an undercover rank on the jail server but I suppose that's different..
